# Left ideals generated by subsets of rings

```agda
module ring-theory.left-ideals-generated-by-subsets-ringsᵉ where
```

</details>

## Idea

Theᵉ **leftᵉ idealᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ aᵉ [subset](ring-theory.subsets-rings.md)**ᵉ `S`ᵉ ofᵉ
aᵉ [ring](ring-theory.rings.mdᵉ) `R`ᵉ isᵉ theᵉ leastᵉ leftᵉ idealᵉ in `R`ᵉ containingᵉ
`S`.ᵉ

## Definitions

### The universal property of left ideals generated by a subset of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
  where

  is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ →
    subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ
```

### The universal property of left ideals generated by a family of subsets of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ l4ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l4ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : (αᵉ : Uᵉ) → Sᵉ αᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
  where

  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ((αᵉ : Uᵉ) → Sᵉ αᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ) →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ Jᵉ
```

### The universal property of left ideals generated by a family of elements of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (aᵉ : Uᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : (αᵉ : Uᵉ) → is-in-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ (aᵉ αᵉ))
  where

  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ((αᵉ : Uᵉ) → is-in-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ (aᵉ αᵉ)) →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ Jᵉ
```

### Construction of the Galois connection of left ideals generated by subsets

#### Left ideals generated by subsets

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ : UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ =
    listᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ ×ᵉ type-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ)

  ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
  ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ = zero-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
  ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (consᵉ (pairᵉ rᵉ sᵉ) lᵉ) =
    add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ))
      ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  preserves-concat-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (uᵉ vᵉ : left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) →
    ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (concat-listᵉ uᵉ vᵉ) ＝ᵉ
    add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
      ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ)
  preserves-concat-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ vᵉ =
    invᵉ (left-unit-law-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ))
  preserves-concat-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
    ( consᵉ (pairᵉ rᵉ sᵉ) uᵉ) vᵉ =
    ( apᵉ
      ( add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ)))
      ( preserves-concat-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ vᵉ)) ∙ᵉ
    ( invᵉ
      ( associative-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ))
        ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
        ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ)))

  mul-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ →
    left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ → left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
  mul-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ =
    map-listᵉ (λ xᵉ → pairᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (pr1ᵉ xᵉ)) (pr2ᵉ xᵉ))

  preserves-mul-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (rᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) (uᵉ : left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) →
    ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( mul-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ uᵉ) ＝ᵉ
    mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
  preserves-mul-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ nilᵉ =
    invᵉ (right-zero-law-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ)
  preserves-mul-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ (consᵉ xᵉ uᵉ) =
    ( ap-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( associative-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ (pr1ᵉ xᵉ) (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ (pr2ᵉ xᵉ)))
      ( preserves-mul-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ uᵉ)) ∙ᵉ
    ( invᵉ
      ( left-distributive-mul-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ
        ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (pr1ᵉ xᵉ) (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ (pr2ᵉ xᵉ)))
        ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)))

  subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ =
    fiberᵉ ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ

  subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    trunc-Propᵉ (subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ)

  is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ = is-in-subtypeᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  contains-zero-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    contains-zero-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  contains-zero-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ = unit-trunc-Propᵉ (pairᵉ nilᵉ reflᵉ)

  is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    (xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) →
    subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ → subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ yᵉ →
    subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ) (pairᵉ kᵉ qᵉ)) =
    concat-listᵉ lᵉ kᵉ
  pr2ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ) (pairᵉ kᵉ qᵉ)) =
    ( preserves-concat-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ kᵉ) ∙ᵉ
    ( ap-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ pᵉ qᵉ)

  is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-addition-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ {xᵉ} {yᵉ} Hᵉ Kᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
      ( subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ))
      ( λ H'ᵉ →
        apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Kᵉ
          ( subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ))
          ( λ K'ᵉ →
            unit-trunc-Propᵉ
              ( is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ H'ᵉ K'ᵉ)))

  is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    (rᵉ xᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) → subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ →
    subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ xᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ rᵉ xᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ)) =
    mul-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ lᵉ
  pr2ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ rᵉ xᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ)) =
    ( preserves-mul-ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ lᵉ) ∙ᵉ
    ( apᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ) pᵉ)

  is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-left-multiplication-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ rᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
      ( subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ xᵉ))
      ( λ H'ᵉ →
        unit-trunc-Propᵉ
          ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ rᵉ xᵉ H'ᵉ))

  is-closed-under-negatives-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-negatives-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-negatives-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ {xᵉ} Hᵉ =
    trᵉ
      ( type-Propᵉ ∘ᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
      ( mul-neg-one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ)
      ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
        ( neg-one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
        ( xᵉ)
        ( Hᵉ))

  left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  pr1ᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ = subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)) = contains-zero-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ))) =
    is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (pr2ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ))) =
    is-closed-under-negatives-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (pr2ᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ sᵉ Hᵉ =
    unit-trunc-Propᵉ
      ( pairᵉ
        ( consᵉ (pairᵉ (one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) (pairᵉ sᵉ Hᵉ)) nilᵉ)
        ( ( right-unit-law-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) sᵉ)) ∙ᵉ
          ( left-unit-law-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ sᵉ)))

  contains-left-formal-combinations-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l3ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) → Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ →
    (xᵉ : left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) →
    is-in-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ (ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ)
  contains-left-formal-combinations-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ nilᵉ =
    contains-zero-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
  contains-left-formal-combinations-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ
    ( consᵉ (pairᵉ rᵉ (pairᵉ sᵉ Kᵉ)) cᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ rᵉ sᵉ (Hᵉ sᵉ Kᵉ))
      ( contains-left-formal-combinations-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ cᵉ)

  is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
      ( contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
  is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ {lᵉ} Jᵉ Kᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ) Pᵉ
    where
    Pᵉ : subset-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ → is-in-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ
    Pᵉ (pairᵉ cᵉ reflᵉ) =
      contains-left-formal-combinations-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Jᵉ Kᵉ cᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ yᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ yᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-left-ideal-Ring'ᵉ Rᵉ left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The subset relation is preserved by generating left ideals

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  preserves-order-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) (Tᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ Tᵉ →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
  preserves-order-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Tᵉ Hᵉ =
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
      ( transitive-leq-subtypeᵉ Sᵉ Tᵉ
        ( subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
        ( contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
        ( Hᵉ))

  left-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ :
    hom-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( λ l2ᵉ → l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  map-hom-Large-Preorderᵉ left-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ =
    left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  preserves-order-hom-Large-Preorderᵉ left-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-order-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The Galois connection `S ↦ (S)`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  adjoint-relation-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ) Iᵉ ↔ᵉ
    (Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (adjoint-relation-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ) Hᵉ =
    transitive-leq-subtypeᵉ Sᵉ
      ( subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
      ( subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
      ( Hᵉ)
      ( contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
  pr2ᵉ (adjoint-relation-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ) =
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ

  left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( l1ᵉ ⊔ᵉ_) (λ lᵉ → lᵉ)
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  lower-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    left-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  upper-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    subset-left-ideal-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  adjoint-relation-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    adjoint-relation-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The reflective Galois connection `S ↦ (S)`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  forward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  forward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
      ( Iᵉ)
      ( refl-leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)

  backward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
  backward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)

  is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    is-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
      ( left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Aᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ) =
    forward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ) =
    backward-inclusion-is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ

  left-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  galois-connection-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    left-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  is-reflective-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    left-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    is-reflective-left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ
```

### The left ideal generated by a family of subsets of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    subset-Ringᵉ (l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    union-family-of-subtypesᵉ Sᵉ xᵉ

  left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  is-in-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ)
  is-in-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  contains-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    {αᵉ : Uᵉ} → (Sᵉ αᵉ) ⊆ᵉ subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ
  contains-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ {αᵉ} xᵉ Hᵉ =
    contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( xᵉ)
      ( unit-trunc-Propᵉ (αᵉ ,ᵉ Hᵉ))

  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ
      ( left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( λ αᵉ → contains-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
  is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ
    Jᵉ Hᵉ =
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( Jᵉ)
      ( λ yᵉ qᵉ →
        apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ qᵉ
          ( subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ yᵉ)
          ( λ (αᵉ ,ᵉ Kᵉ) → Hᵉ αᵉ yᵉ Kᵉ))
```

### The left ideal generated by a family of elements in a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Iᵉ : UUᵉ l1ᵉ} (aᵉ : Iᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    trunc-Propᵉ (fiberᵉ aᵉ xᵉ)

  left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  is-in-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ l1ᵉ
  is-in-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    is-in-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  contains-element-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ :
    (iᵉ : Iᵉ) → is-in-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ (aᵉ iᵉ)
  contains-element-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ iᵉ =
    contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ)
      ( aᵉ iᵉ)
      ( unit-trunc-Propᵉ (iᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ))

  abstract
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ :
      is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ Rᵉ aᵉ
        left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
        contains-element-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
    is-left-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
      Jᵉ Hᵉ =
      is-left-ideal-generated-by-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( generating-subset-left-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ)
        ( Jᵉ)
        ( λ xᵉ pᵉ →
          apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ pᵉ
            ( subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ)
            ( λ where (iᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ) → Hᵉ iᵉ))
```

## Properties

### The left ideal generated by the underlying subset of an left ideal `I` is `I` itself

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Iᵉ : left-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (lᵉ : left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)) →
    is-in-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( ev-left-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ) lᵉ)
  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ =
    contains-zero-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
    ( consᵉ (xᵉ ,ᵉ yᵉ ,ᵉ uᵉ) lᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-addition-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( is-closed-under-left-multiplication-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ xᵉ yᵉ uᵉ)
      ( cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  abstract
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
      leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
        ( Iᵉ)
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
      apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
        ( subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ xᵉ)
        ( λ where
          ( lᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ) →
            cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  backward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    leq-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( Iᵉ)
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
  backward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    contains-subset-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)

  idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    has-same-elements-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-left-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ) =
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ) =
    backward-inclusion-idempotent-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
```

### The operation `S ↦ (S)` preserves least upper bounds

Inᵉ
[`ring-theory.joins-left-ideals-rings`](ring-theory.joins-left-ideals-rings.mdᵉ)
weᵉ willᵉ convertᵉ thisᵉ factᵉ to theᵉ factᵉ thatᵉ `Sᵉ ↦ᵉ (S)`ᵉ preservesᵉ joins.ᵉ

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  preserves-least-upper-bounds-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l4ᵉ : Level} (Tᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l4ᵉ Rᵉ) →
    is-least-upper-bound-family-of-elements-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ))
      ( Sᵉ)
      ( Tᵉ) →
    is-least-upper-bound-family-of-elements-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( λ αᵉ → left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (Sᵉ αᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Tᵉ)
  preserves-least-upper-bounds-left-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-join-lower-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ))
      ( left-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( left-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)
```
